name: Sex Simulator - Beach Resort Girls
description:
A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters, all set in a beautiful decor. You play as a woman who has sex with three different women on her vacation at a luxury resort.

Game description

If you enjoyed our Sex Simulator series, you’ll definitely love this one!
With new characters, arousing stories, and much fancier decors, Sex Simulator - Beach Resort Girls is the perfect game if you enjoy girl on girl action.

This story features an attractive young redhead who wants to make the most of her holiday in the sun.
Each episode presents her and three other women she meets in various situations during her stay at the luxury resort.
Step into her shoes and use your feminine charm to combine friendliness and flirtation in order to get them wet!

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker, we got this part covered for you.
All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the women achieve orgasm before you run out of stamina.
Pick between 3 different types of sex and feel free to swap between the various camera angles we set up for you so that you won’t miss any of the hot details happening on screen.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well…it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until everybody’s satisfied.

Features

90+ HD quality renders
18 HD animations
